#summary Various file formats handled by EARS
#labels manual

== Query file ==
A query file may contain any number of queries. Query terms (optionally along with the corresponding weights) are enumerated between `<DOC qID>` and `</DOC>` tags, where `qID` is a unique query identifier. The query format (terms with or without weights) is controlled by parameter `QueryFileFormat`. 

|| *Format* || *Syntax* || *Example* || 
|| `0` (default) || `<DOC qID>`<br>`term_1`<br>`...`<br>`term_n`<br>`</DOC>` || `<DOC q-01>`<br>`solar`<br>`energy`<br>`</DOC>` ||
|| `1` || `<DOC qID>`<br>`term_1;weight_1`<br>`...`<br>`term_n;weight_n`<br>`</DOC>` || `<DOC q-01>`<br>`solar;0.55`<br>`energy;0.45`<br>`</DOC>` ||

== Document-entity association file ==
The syntax of the document-entity association file is controlled by the parameter `AssociationFileFormat`. 

|| *Format* || *Syntax* || *Example* || 
|| `0` (default) || `EntityID DOCNO` || `Entity-01 Doc-01`<br>`Entity-02 Doc-01`<br>`Entity-01 Doc-02` ||
|| `1` || `EntityID DOCNO weight` || `Entity-01 Doc-01 0.5`<br>`Entity-02 Doc-01 0.5`<br>`Entity-01 Doc-02 0.2` ||
|| `2` || `EntityAlias DOCNO` || `Person-01-name Doc-01`<br>`Person-01-email Doc-01`<br>`Person-02-name Doc-01` ||
|| `3` || `EntityAlias DOCNO weight` || `Person-01-name Doc-01 0.1`<br>`Person-01-email Doc-01 0.3`<br>`Person-02-name Doc-01 0.2` ||

Notes:
  * columns are separated by whitespace
  * `DOCNO` denotes the external document ID 
  * `weight` is a non-negative numeric value (integer or real)
  * when `EntityAlias` is used, an !EntityAlias-EntityID mapping needs to be provided; see [EntityRepresentation] and below

== !EntityAlias-EntityID mapping file ==
Location defined in parameter `entityAliasMapping`. See [EntityRepresentation] for the explanation of entity aliases.

|| *Syntax* || *Example* || 
|| `EntityAlias EntityID` || `johnsmith John_Smith`<br>`john.smith@email.com John_Smith`<br>`anotheralias John_Smith` ||


== Output file ==
The syntax of the output file is controlled by the parameter `OutputFileFormat`. 

|| *Format* || *Task* || *Syntax* || *Example* || 
|| `0` (default) || `ef` || `qID Q0 entityID rank score runID` || `q-01 Q0 Entity-03 1 0.891 Model1`<br>`q-01 Q0 Entity-19 2 0.750 Model1`<br>`q-01 Q0 Entity-01 3 0.749 Model1` ||
|| `1` || `ef` || `qID entityID score` || `q-01 Entity-03 0.891 Model1`<br>`q-01 Entity-19 0.750`<br>`q-01 Entity-01 0.749` ||
|| `0` (default) || `ep` || `entityID Q0 qID rank score runID` || `Entity-01 Q0 q-13 1 0.179 Model1`<br>`Entity-01 Q0 q-27 2 0.153 Model1`<br>`Entity-01 Q0 q-09 3 0.091 Model1`<br> ||
|| `1` || `ep` || `entityID qID score` || `Entity-01 q-13 0.179`<br>`Entity-01 q-27 0.153`<br>`Entity-01 q-09 0.091`<br> ||
